<page title>: IOGEAR GCL1800 Rackmount LCD 1 Computer s 17 LCD 2 x PS 2 Port 3 x USB 881317506139 | eBay
general information: Marketing Information IOGEAR's new GCL1800 Rackmount LCD offers a space saving, streamlined approach to IT environments by integrating a keyboard, 17" TFT LCD active matrix monitor, and touchpad in one unit. The LCD display is built into the cover; the keyboard and touchpad are built into the base. Setup is fast and easy. There is no software to configure, no installation routines and no incompatibility problems. Slide the console module section out; flip the cover up; and you are ready to go to work. When finished, flip the cover down and slide the console module back into the rack.
package contents: GCL1800 Rackmount LCD1 x USB KVM Cable1 x Firmware Upgrade Cable1 x Rack Mount Kit1 x Grounding Wire1 x Power Cord1 x Installation Guide1 x Warranty Card
